scripts.generate-grpc: mkdir -p generated && grpc_tools_node_protoc --proto_path=proto --proto_path=node_modules/google-proto-files --js_out=import_style=commonjs,binary:./generated --grpc_out=grpc_js:./generated proto/tika_parser.proto proto/pipe_step_processor_service.proto proto/module_registration.proto proto/pipeline_core_types.proto
